body.name: SAMSUNG 55-Inch Class Neo QLED 4K QN85C Series Neo Quantum HDR, Dolby Atmos, Object Tracking Sound, Motion Xcelerator Turbo+, Gaming Hub, Smart TV with Alexa Built-in (QN55QN85CAFXZA, 2023 Model)

FREE pickup Tomorrow ready by 2 PMMODIA - Westheimer Rd 77057 · 17.1 mi
features: QUANTUM MATRIX W/ MINI LEDS: See every freckle on your favorite actor’s face thanks to the huge grid of Samsung’s ultra-precise Quantum Mini LEDs that take control of the individual zones of light in your picture for sensational color and contrast.Voltage : 120 volts (AC)

NEURAL QUANTUM PROCESSOR W/ 4K UPSCALING: Whether streaming an HD movie, watching sports or looking at home videos, experience it transformed into sharp 4K resolution with our high-performance, AI-powered processor upgrading content scene by scene*

NEO QUANTUM HDR: Discover variety in every frame—with Neo Quantum HDR’s dynamic contrast and brilliant colors, all in 4K resolution; Contrast is adjusted to best fit each scene, helping showcase more accurate colors

DOLBY ATMOS & OBJECT TRACKING SOUND: Hear the audio move with the story with Dolby Atmos and Object Tracking Sound; When cars are speeding across the screen, 3D sound moves right along with them thanks to Object Tracking Sound

MOTION XCELERATOR TURBO+ (4K @120Hz): Get smooth performance during the fastest games and action scenes; Keep up with the speed and catch every frame without lag or motion blur; Enjoy seamless action and 4K visuals at speeds up to 120Hz

Q-SYMPHONY 3.0: With Q-Symphony, your TV speakers paired with Q-Series and S-Series soundbar operate as one; Together, they can optimize all the channels to bring you a masterfully orchestrated sound experience**

SAMSUNG GAMING HUB: Gaming comes together–bringing the best of console games, streaming games and more–all in one place; Get easier access to games, standalone apps and accessories, get recommendations for other games, adjust settings and more***

PANTONE VALIDATED: Enjoy color validated by industry leading experts at Pantone; From every fantastic detail on your favorite runway competition to each course of cooking shows, experience it in a whole new way only on Samsung TV screens

NEOSLIM DESIGN: If you’re like us, you just can’t stand it when presentation is an afterthought; With its NeoSlim Design this TV’s ultra-slim silhouette and hexagonal plate stand nails that first impression

SOLAR REMOTE: Turn up the volume on sustainability with the innovative SolarCell RemoteTM; It features a solar panel for charging, as well as other smart features including a built-in microphone to use with your favorite voice assistant
body.description: Samsung Neo QLED 4K is a whole different deal. We’re talking over a billion shades of color. Larger-than-life sound that reacts to the action on screen. And resolution that’s automatically enhanced, no matter what you’re watching. This is 4K for the future. *Utilizes AI-Based formulas. **Q-Series and S-Series soundbars sold separately. ***High speed internet connection, additional gaming service subscriptions and compatible controller required.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't be happier with my purchase of the SAMSUNG 85-Inch Class Neo QLED 4K QN85C TV! This television has truly exceeded all of my expectations, earning every one of its five stars.First and foremost, the setup process was an absolute breeze. From unboxing to getting it up and running, everything was straightforward and hassle-free. I was able to enjoy my new TV in no time, thanks to the user-friendly interface and clear instructions provided.But what truly sets this TV apart is its outstanding picture quality. The Neo QLED technology delivers stunning visuals with vibrant colors, deep blacks, and remarkable contrast. Whether I'm watching my favorite movies, sports events, or playing video games, the picture quality remains consistently excellent. The 4K resolution ensures that every detail is crisp and lifelike, making it feel like I'm right there in the action.The 85-inch screen size is perfect for creating a cinematic experience in my living room. It's like having my very own home theater! The immersive viewing experience is further enhanced by the TV's minimal bezels and sleek design, which adds a touch of elegance to my living space.The TV also comes with a variety of smart features and apps, making it incredibly versatile. I can easily stream my favorite content, control smart home devices, and access a world of entertainment at my fingertips. The remote control is intuitive and responsive, making navigation a breeze.In conclusion, the SAMSUNG 85-Inch Class Neo QLED 4K QN85C has transformed my home entertainment setup. It's the perfect combination of ease of use, outstanding picture quality, and smart functionality. I couldn't be happier with my purchase, and I highly recommend this TV to anyone looking for a top-tier viewing experience. It's a five-star product through and through!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 99% I was sent a brand new TV for the price of "like new"
reviews.reviewText: Coming from 32", 720p Samsung LCD from 2007 (which to Samsung's credit was still in perfect working order less one flaky HDMI port and a whining component), any cheap no-name UHD TV coupled with my already 4K capable Roku would have been a significant upgrade in every category except longevity, but I am extremely satisfied I picked this model, which sits at the lower end of Samsung's 2023 NeoQLED TV lineup. For the unacquainted, these are a step below the highest tier OLED panels, but a step up from the regular QLED and even cheaper yet Crystal UHD models you'd see at a big box store (which all still look great, modern TVs are overpowered). The image has a lot more contrast, less glare, and deeper blacks than my roommates 65" QLED model from a couple years ago.I really only stream these days, don't game, and don't even have a sound bar (I would recommend getting one, as the built in is tinny and doesn't project forward well), so most of the features and gimmicks are lost on me. I just wanted a bigger and sharper panel, and this one is incredible.Overall, I'm glad I went with a Samsung again. The remote is not intuitive whatsoever, the WiFi receiver isn't great, and Smart TV features and UI are a cluttered disaster that I would recommend replacing with a Roku, but to it's credit setup and control interaction with my Galaxy S23 was seamless, and performance of built in apps has been so good (one you get to them) that I haven't reconnected the Roku. Can't speak to Longevity, but Samsung TVs (at least the panels) have historically been rock solid. Build quality and materials on this lineup are incredible, the Smart features can easily be replaced with a newer Roku down the road, so I anticipate this will last a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Immersive Entertainment Unleashed! The 85” Samsung TV is a visual masterpiece, boasting incredible picture quality and depth that elevates the viewing experience. The colors pop with vivid brilliance, and the details are razor-sharp on this expansive screen. The smart features are a game-changer, seamlessly integrating with Google Home for convenient control and a truly connected home theater experience. With a perfect blend of stunning visuals and intelligent functionality, this TV stands out as a top-tier choice for those who demand both style and substance in their entertainment setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Picture is wonderful and shipping worked out fine.
reviews.reviewText: Based on negative shipping reviews I was really nervous about ordering online through amazon. TV came laying down in the truck with a furniture box crushing it. Expected the TV to be crushed but to my surprise it worked great when they took it out of the box. The TV itself is wonderful. The Neo QNED has a wonderful picture and clean image. Remote is not as bad as everyone makes it out to be. Reminds me of the older 2015 model remotes which I really liked. TV has a million options for adjustments etc. My PS5 really pops. Almost overwhelming at first. My work has a LG QNED 85 which is a little less in price but this TV in my opinion performs much better. Well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Destroyed somewhere along the line
reviews.reviewText: I realize that our experience with this TV is not Samsung's fault but buying a large device like this on Amazon, you have to take certain things into consideration, like the contractor they use who take absolutely no care in getting your item to you. I can't say where this thing was destroyed or when but something was clearly dropped on it. It was not visible at all until we tried to turn it on and saw this flash. It obviously doesn't work. It is heavy and now we have to get it back downstairs and rebox it for pickup. We ended up buying another, someplace else. Hopefully those people will handle it better. If our local big box store had it, I would of just said, heck with it and gone there. Edit: While reboxing it, I found a paper taped to the box from 1-2 months earlier where it had been delivered to someone halfway across the country from us and they refused it. I wonder why. The box looked like it had been bounced around in a truck months. We got our replacement from another source and had absolutely no issues.
